name: Momma Moon Sitz Bath
description:
Ancient Salts & traditional florals combine to form a gentle, healing soak for Mommas post-birth. {6oz}

For bath use: add 1 cup of herbs to 2 quarts of boiling water. Remove water from heat and let sit for 20 minutes. Strain and add to a bath and soak for 20 minutes. This lovely mix of herbs speeds perineum healing.
Brew with the above ratios and add to a Peri-Bottle for use during or after using the restroom. Pour some pre-brewed herbal mix on to pads and freeze for a pain relieving ice pack. Can be diluted and applied to baby’s cord for hastened healing.
Also effective for sore muscles and sprains. Prepare as above and soak affected area for pain relief.


We only use non-GMO sources, and organic or wild-crafted when possible. Ingredients: Pink Sea Salt, Ancient Mineral Magnesium Salt, Red Raspberry Leaf, Blue Violet, Lavender Buds, Comfrey Leaf, Witch Hazel Leaf, Rosemary Leaf Powder, Pink Roses, Olive Leaf, Yarrow Flowers, Calendula Flowers, and Uva Ursi.

name: Holistic Introduction Collection
Elderberry Syrup Kit
description:
for health & wellness

Contents
Organic Elderberries
Powdered Ginger
2 Cinnamon Sticks
Cheese Cloth
Pint Mason Jar
How to Make
Water (Amount = 2x's your Mason Jar)
Elderberries in Your Kit
Powdered Ginger in Your Kit
Combine in a large pot and bring to a boil, then lower heat to a simmer. Add your Cinnamon Sticks. Reduce by half, which should take about 45 minutes.
Remove from stove and cool to room temperature.
Mash with a masher or hands. Strain through Cheese Cloth back into your Mason Jar. Squeeze all the goodness from your Elderberry mixture before composting both mixture and Cheese Cloth. Fill the rest of your Mason Jar with local raw honey.
Suggested Usage
1tbsp while well 
1oz (shot glass) when exposed to cold or flu
3 to 5 tbsps a day when ill

Note
Take care not to over boil as it can damage plant material. Remember to take early and often to bolster the immune system and avoid contracting a cold or the flu!

name: Sow Your Wild Oats
description:
Sometimes you just need to sow your wild oats.

Our Foundational Organic Grain Cleanser: Oats, Milk powder and traditional florals combine to form a gentle, cleansing and exfoliating facial wash.

Oats are known for their soothing and anti-itch properties while helping to physically remove dead skin build-up. Milk powder contains lactic acid, which provides a deeper (aha-type) exfoliation. Traditional florals, Elderflower and Rose, flush out impurities in your skin’s cells and help prevent clogged pores. Using three different types of exfoliation at once, rather than one type of a stronger exfoliant, will keep your skin healthy-looking and fresh, never irritated. Coriander seed, Elderfowers, Rose Petals, vetivert sandalwood, Neem leaf and Gotu Kola leaf soothe and nourish your skin.

Use:

This powdered cleanser should be mixed at a one to one ratio (1 tsp grain + 1 tsp liquid-making a runny paste) with:

water (for any skin type)
cream (for dry skin)
yoghurt (for hyperpigmentation)
honey (for healing)
Once a week, we recommend mixing your wild oats with honey (1 tsp grain + 1 tbsp honey) for a wonderful and natural masque. Leave it on for about 10 minutes and follow with your regular skin care routine.

Scientists at Waikato University recently documented that honey supports the skins' own cell renewal process, assists in the formation of stronger collagen which is responsible for the skins elasticity. Honey contains antioxidants and is a natural antimicorobial agent. Of course, the town-folk have known that since ancient times!

name: Nourish & Replenish Oil
description:
The foundational Oil: Nourish and Replenish works with the natural processes of your skin's physiology to provide nourishment for new, healthy cell growth while replenishing the lost lipids due to environmental factors and daily living.

How to Use:

After cleansing and misting, leave your skin slightly damp and apply 4-6 drops of your nourish and replenish oil into your palm. Add a few drops of water, and  massage into your skin, (you can follow our Daily Facial Massage Chart - see the Downloads Link on the right) paying close attention to using gentle strokes mixed with pressure on specific points. 

Massage 1-2 minutes and either leave the oil to penetrate or towel off with a damp cloth (do not use paper towels or tissue!)

A 1-2 minute facial massage every night can relax your senses, firm your facial features, promote circulation and encourage healing from both the outside in and the inside out!

N&R Oil is hand-mixed and bottled in small batches with a focus on intention and the flow of energy.

name: Perfection: Sense & Sensitivity Clay
description:
For centuries, clay has traditionally been used to draw out impurities through absorption. Better than gold, earth's silica, iron, magnesium, calcium, sodium, zinc and other minerals bind with environmental toxins while removing old sebum that may be clogging your pores.

Perfection: Sense & Sensitivity Clay gently purifies and restores easily irritated skin. If you thought that dry, dehydrated or sensitive skin should not use clay, here is your chance to give it a try. The Perfection Sense & Sensitivity Clay uses a blend of french red clay, Kaolin, Rhassoul and herbs to create a pore-refining mask suitable for sensitive skin. Remember, all clay masques work by bringing more circulation to the surface of the skin, so don’t be alarmed if you have some “redness” following your treatment. It is only increased circulation and with subside shortly.

Spot treatment: mix a pinch of any clay mixture with equal part water and form a paste in your palm. You may want to add 1 small drop of an essential oil (such as geranium for blemishes or lavender with sensitive clay for sunburns). Dot onto problem spot or area. Leave on overnight, or allow to dry & remove with a damp cloth. This is also great for insect bites and stings.

Facial masque (once a week): mix 2 scoops any Clay Mix with 3 scoops water water, herbal tea (fennel, chamomile, rose, etc.) or aloe juice to make a smooth paste (honey is a great addition as well). You can add a pinch of Sow Your Wild Oats or a drop of the women’s vitality oil blend. Lightly apply over damp/wet skin. Relax with a damp/wet washcloth over your face and witch hazel pads over your eyes for 10 minutes before removing the masque, intermittently misting your face with the Hydrosol of your choosing. You can also wear your masque around the house, vacuuming, dancing, yoga-ing, etc...please experiment! Try letting it dry if you love that tight feeling (it’s certainly better for you than other ways of getting that tiny-pore look!) and press with a damp cloth just before you are about to take it off.


All Perfection Clays are hand-mixed in small batches to perfection. Each batch takes 6 weeks of weekly infusions of herbs. 100% vegan and contains absolutely no chemicals or preservatives!

100% Natural skin protector that removes make-up as it nourishes delicate skin. Eye, ear, nose, and lip protector for those delicate mucus membrane areas. {Also has been known to remove evil on contact.}

name: 100% Pure Organic Rosehip (seed) Oil
description:
In the fall, all of the roses that were not picked from their stems become a small fruit that becomes the seed that may become the next generation of roses. Our certified Organic Rosehip oil is the oil pressed from these seed-fruits.
 
It glides on smoothly because it resembles our skin’s natural oils—non greasy!
• High in omega 3 and omega 6 fatty acids
• High in beta-carotene
• High in natural vitamin c.
 
Improves the skin’s overall appearance, but especially in regards to:
• Stretch marks
• Scars
• Wrinkles
• Dry patches
 
Can be used alone or mixed with Nourish & Replenish or NO EVIL. Safe enough to be used in pregnancy or on children. Useful on sensitive skin & couperose. Suitable for facial and body skin. Highly recommended for brittle, ill-growing nails. Perfect oil for use in facial reflexology/facial point stimulation.

 
Directions:
 
For scars/stretch marks:  Apply 2-4 drops on fingertips and smooth into affected area
 
For general facial use:  Add 2-4 drops of oil into the palm of your hand and add similar amount of water.  Massage into your skin.  You may also do this with 2-4 drops of rosehip oil + 2-4 drops of N&R, NO EVIL, or Cow Fart Juice and add water for your daily facial massage.
 
For Facial Reflexology/Facial Point Stimulation:  Use a cup to mix 10-30 drops of Rosehip Oil, 10-30 drops N&R Oil and 10-30 drops of NO EVIL.  Add 1 tsp of your favorite hydrosol and massage onto your face and neck.  Stimulate your pressure points.  You may even use this opportunity to steam your skin with our Steam Boat Steamer before you gently blot your skin with a dry clean cloth. 

 
For external use only.  Do not apply to broken or infected skin.

name: Infused Organic Coconut Oil
description:
100% Organic Coconut Oil infused with Sustainably wild-crafted Calendula & Red Clover. Completely Chemical-free, Preservative-free, and Fragrance-free. This product is a foundational piece of Holistic Baby (& Adult) Skin Care.  

Use for: Daily Baby Massage, As a Traditional Remedy for Eczema & Dry Skin, Diaper Balm, Meconium Cleansing & Cradle Cap Solution  

Coconut oil, Cocos nucifera, is extracted from the kernel of matured coconuts. It is known to reduce inflammation, support tissue healing, functions as a protective antioxidant, aids the natural chemical balance of the skin, softens skin and helps to relieve dryness and flaking. Red clover, Trifolium pratense, is a wild legume that has been traditionally used to soothe skin inflammations. Calendula officinalis, of the marigold family, has been used for centuries to heal wounds and skin irritations. This powerful trio protects and nourishes new life as well as the old.  

Directions: For baby massage after bathtime. Cradle cap: massage into scalp, leave on for a few minutes and gently rinse with warm water and a soft cloth. As a cloth diaper safe diaper balm, rub on baby’s bottom after changing. Very gentle method for meconium cleansing. Effective remedy traditionally used for Eczema and dry skin. Helps prevent stretch marks during pregnancy and lessen their appearance. Apply to Mother’s perineum to heal after birth & nipples to sooth irritation.

name: Baby Moon Bum Spray
description:
Baby Moon Bum Spray is a gentle alternative to potentially irritating commercial baby wipes. It combines potent herbal hydrosols with infused Witch Hazel and Tea Tree Essential {super-cleansing} oil to cleanse and protect bottoms, large and small. A small percentage (7%) of Organic Alcohol works well to kill bacteria and prevent diaper rash from occurring. Comes in a 2oz aluminum spray bottle, convenient for travel and your diaperbag.

Directions: Spray on a soft cloth and wipe baby with firm, yet gentle, motions when changing diaper. For crustier issues, hold a moistened cloth on the area for a moment before wiping.  Also can be used to soothe and reduce momma’s external hemorrhoids post-partum. Enjoy our natural alternative to potentially irritating commercial baby wipes!

name: Baby Moon Milk Bath
description:
Baby Moon Milk Bath is a perfect gentle cleanser for daily use during bathtime. Organic Oats, Organic Cultured (Probiotic) Milk, Organic Chamomile & Lavender Flowers. Soothing and wonderful for bodies big and small! 

Directions: Add 1-2 spoonfuls to baby’s bath or yours. We like to fill a muslin bag  with Milk Bath and float it in the water to avoid any tub residue from the powdered flowers.  You can then use it as gentle wash sack. Supervise babies in water at all times.

A little History and Science:
Oats, Avena sativa, have long been hailed as healers. Oat polysaccharides become gooey in water and leave a fine protective film on the skin. Saponins gently remove dirt and oil. Oat proteins and fats maintain the skin’s natural barrier function and moisture. Cleopatra was partial to Milk Baths, and with good reason. Milk is full of healthy fats and vitamins which moisturize skin. Lactic acid in milk is mildly exfoliating. Probiotics assist in neutralizing destructive bacteria. Chamomile, Matricaria chamomilla, & Lavender, Lavandula, flowers are traditionally used for soothing and calming the body’s nervous system. 

Recipes for Milk Baths:
Egyptian: Add 1/2 cup honey and a few scoops of Milk Bath to running water. 
Magnesium: Mix 1 cup Epsom salt with 1/2 cup Milk Bath. Add to bath.
Fresh Rose: Add the petals or one or two roses to your Milk Bath.
Super Creamy: Add 1 cup of organic cream to enrich your Milk Bath.
Super Probiotic: Add 1 cup of whole plain yogurt to enrich your Milk Bath.
Coconut: Add 1 cup of coconut milk to  your Milk Bath for additional soothing.

name: Baby Moon Zinc Ointment
description:
Baby Moon Zinc Ointment is nature's surest method of waterproofing baby's bottom against diaper rash. (4oz) The element zinc has long been used as a protective barrier on skin against corrosive elements, including liquids against the skin. This wonder ointment fully utilizes zinc's inherent moisture blocking properties and combines it with baby friendly oils, essential oils, and beeswax. It's the ultimate in natural baby barrier ointments! 

Directions: Apply baby's bottom cleaning and drying to stop any irritation from occurring. Also can be applied in a thin layer anywhere to protect minor scrapes, burns, bug bites and irritations. If baby already has diaper rash, spend as much time diaper free as possible in order to keep baby dry and allow healing. Cotton or hemp cloth diapers are best for air circulation.

name: Baby Moon Baby Wash
description:
For those times when just water won’t do, you need a real baby wash that is safe and effective. Baby Moon Baby Wash is wonderful for baby's sensitive skin and hair during bath time. We recommend it especially for the diaper area and to dissolve crusty food and dirt. 

What about Suds? Our Baby Wash contains a gentle skin-safe surfactant derived from coconut and palm oils, which sounds similar to SLS but is in fact quite different. Our surfactant has a much larger molecule size that forms bubbles and lather but does not penetrate the skins surface and strip it of natural moisture. We recommend using this Baby Wash along with Baby Moon Milk Bath for clean, soft, hydrated baby skin. 

Note: We've doubled the amount we give you for the price and have repackaged Baby Wash in a tub-safe PET blue bottle. Just because we love babies!

name: Baby Moon Body Powder
description:
For delicate bottoms, big & small. The Baby Moon Body Powder by Between You & The Moon is a gentle alternative to commercial, potentially irritating baby powders. Talc-free, preservative-free, and fragrance-free, you can feel confident using this non-medicated powder on your baby as well as on your self. 

For external use only. Good for 2 years if kept dry & in favorable conditions.  (Not too hot or humid, closed when not in use, etc...)

name: Organic Baby Moon Wipe & Wash
description:
A Concentrated potion for cleansing and soothing baby skin. 
Here's our secret weapon in making homemade, organic, sustainable baby wipes. You always knew you could do it yourself! Can also be used to wipe crusty little noses, grubby hands, and just about anywhere on your baby's body. Remember, this is super concentrated, so dilute well before using!

Making your own Wipes:

Idea #1: Shake well and measure and measure two (2) teaspoons W&W concentrate into 2 ounce bottle (provided). Fill to the first line with distilled water and then to the second line with witch hazel. Spray onto organic cotton flannel cloth (easy to find on Etsy) and...voila!

Safe enough to spray onto baby though he or she may not enjoy the cool temperatures so much.

Idea #2: Refill an old diaper wipes container with 1/2 cup of distilled water and/or witch hazel and clean cloths. Add 1 tablespoon W&W Concentrate and mix. Use within 1 week.

Remember, we make a lovely witch hazel enhanced with rose petals and lavender flowers.

Elder Flowers, Rose Petals, Lavender, and Chamomile soothe and nourish your skin.

name: LOMAH Land of Milk and Honey Double cleansing Lotion
description:
LOMAH Land of Milk and Honey Double-Cleansing Lotion {at least 90% Organic}

A light, Luxurious cleansing, moisture, and repair lotion made from organic milk and honey. Great for acneic, oily, normal & problem skin, it helps to protect and repair your skin's natural defensive line (the rhein's barrier) and prevent breakout.

Uses:
1. As a daily cleanser, it takes off make-up, gently removes dirt and debris. Oily and breakout prone skin should use it once a day, applying over dry skin and adding water to the finger tips before working it around in circles. Remove with a damp cloth. You may follow it with Sow Your Wild Oats and Nourish & Replenish.

2. As a light moisture lotion, anyone can use it as a daily or pick-me-up moisturizer. Honey is an excellent humectant and this lotion feels healthy & nourishing. 

3. As a breakout treatment for large or small areas. Applying LOMAH over large areas of breakout skin helps improve the texture and appearance of a breakout better than any type of drying treatment. 


How it works: 
The gentle cleansing exfoliation of milk (lactic acid) combined with the anti-bacterial power of honey prevents break-outs by teaching your skin how to discern between what is YOU and what is OTHER. 
Your skin is naturally assisted in protecting itself from outside forces (pollution, dust, grime, toxins, pesticides, etc.) resulting in less inflammation, fewer pustules and the repair of raw skin. Additionally, honey helps to repair your skin’s natural defensive line, the rhein’s barrier. The oil-reducing properties of Willowbark and the antibacterial properties of neem make this an ideal moisturizer for anyone with acne-prone skin who needs the soothing qualities of a light
moisturizer.

Holistic Triangulation: 
Indicated for HIGH HEAT, LOW WATER, HIGH OIL conditions. 
Acneic, dehydration-related breakout, mature, immature, normal to oily and combination. (pH: 4.5 - 5.5 - helps to restore the acid mantle) 

The Name: 
If we look into literary archaeology, there are many references to “a land flowing with Milk and Honey” or a promised land in ancient biblical literature. We make this reference literally, meaning that this lotion actually flows with milk and honey and literarily, implying beauty, health and abundance for those who are willing to seek it.


Note: It is a favorite among teenagers as well as the men-folk who want to have young-looking, healthy skin without actually having to admit to using skin care products.

name: Magick Potion Lotion
description:
**SHIPPING IN JANUARY**If ordered in DEC, 2 for the price of 1 Special will still be honored!**

This unique and naturally-based treatment is loaded with powerful active ingredients of hyaluronic acid, DMAE, vitamin A, B, C and E, CoQ10 and alpha lipoic acid while incorporating the use of multi-fruit acids and the “wonder-oil” that comes from the meadowfoam plant, all in a pure rosewater distillate base.
Prepare for profoundly transformative results!

Use:
1. Morning: After cleansing, add 1-2 pumps of Magick Potion Lotion to your finger tips and apply all over your face and neck. Mist with Hydrosol and massage in upward circular motions, creating a light "foam". Allow to set for a few minutes and it will soak in completely before applying your N&R oil, LOMAH Lotion, Blooming Rose Creme or just make-up, depending on your skin's needs. 
2. Evening: apply before make-up for a night out and about! Simply apply to clean skin, massage (with water or a hydrosol) to create the Magic Potion Foam, allow to set and apply make-up. 

Frequency:
We recommend using this product for three weeks and then taking a one-week break every month. Do not use in conjunction with pharmaceutical skin care, heavy AHAs and retinols or the BY&TM Vita-C ten day treatment (you CAN do that during your "week-off" though. 


The Story of Magick Potion Lotion (According to Emma):
How does one create a healthy skin care treatment that lives up to this name?! Yes, I have been listening. You love the products; you love how healthy and fresh you skin feels using the all-natural stuff everyday. Your skin tone and texture has improved following a simple 2 to 3 step regimen faithfully. But all those claims from the other skin care lines …magazines…the department store…the drug store (ahhhh!!!) each promising youth and beauty. But at what cost? Petrol-products? Parabins? And do they work? Are there enough active ingredients in the drug store brand (mixed with a slurry of chemical skin care) to actually make a difference? Hmmm…But I am listening. I know you want it. That magic Potion Lotion. The one that is filled with the newest advances in skin care to remove wrinkles, fine lines, dark spots, blemishes, years! So, here you go. I did it. This unique and naturally-based treatment is loaded with the popular and powerful active ingredients of hyaluronic acid, DMAE, vitamin A, B, C and E, CoQ10 and alpha lipoic acid while incorporating the use of multi-fruit acids and the “wonder-oil” that comes from the meadowfoam plant. Oh, and did I mention that it’s made with pure rosewater distillate? Remember, no matter how fancy we can get—it’s still Between You & The Moon. 

About the "advanced" ingredients:
Hyaluronic Acid was "discovered" by Karl Meyer in 1934 and since then, has been successfully used in personal care and wound healing. It is a substance that is naturally found in the extra cellular matrix of human tissue (Like elastin in collagen). When topically applied, hyaluronic acid forms an air permeable layer that can penetrate the dermis (the next layer down from the epidermis), thus boosting the elasticity and hydration of the skin. The protective breathable barrier on the skin locks in moisture and has a unique ability to hold more than 1000 ml of water per gram of hyaluronic acid, which gives the skin a youthful appearance. Amazingly, hyaluronic acid adjusts its moisture absorption based on the relative humidity in the air meaning that it adjusts to the skin’s need for a moisturizing effect depending on the season and climate of an area. Hyaluronic acid has also been shown to protect the epidermis by scavenging reactive oxygen species generated by ultra violet light, which would normally cause sunspots. The Hyaluronic acid in MPL is made by a Vegan-approved fermentation process in an organic-based lab (not mine!). 
Niacinamide is an amazing antioxidant that works for aging and acne related issues. It is the biologically active form of niacin, Vitamin B3 which increases the rate of skin exfoliation and increases moisture barrier repair. Studies have shown it to be useful in increasing synthesis of collagen and lipids, inhibiting the transfer of melanosomes and decreasing inflammation. "Niacinamide is one of the vitamins that I believe we'll hear more and more about in the coming years. Already, topical 4% niacinamide has been shown to be beneficial in the treatment of papular and pustular acne in a 4% gel, as well as the improvement of skin cancer and its anti-tumor characteristics'' (Dr. Draelos). SOURCE: American Academy of Dermatology. 
Pro-Vitamin B5 (dl-Panthenol) is a popular humectant known for it's ability to counteract environmental and age-related dryness as well as increase the moisture retention capacity of the skin. This allows dry skin to stay supple and elastic longer. It is anti-inflammatory and stimulates skin regeneration. Together, Niacinamide and Panthenol improve the condition of the skin's moisture barrier, a function considered by dermatologists as critical to healthy skin. 
AS mentioned (over and over again) in Dr. Nicholas Perricone’s #1 New York Times Best Seller, The Wrinkle Cure, Unlock the Power of Cosmeceuticals for Supple, Youthful Skin it … DMAE, Alpha Lipoic, Ester C and Vitamin E are rock-n-roll for your skin. According to Dr. Perricone, products containing DMAE, Alpha Lipoic Acid, Vitamin C Ester, Alpha Hydroxy Acids, Vitamin E and Retinol (Vitamin A) can create amazing results in the appearance of aging skin. DMAE is found in foods and can create an almost immediate appearance in the firming and tone of the skin. Vitamin C Ester is well known and long documented antioxidant that protects the surface of the skin from free radicals that can damage the skin. Alpha Lipoic Acid is the most powerful of antioxidants. It is able to benefit both the water and lipid portions of the skin. It is said to give the skin a “youthful and glowing appearance.” Retinol Palmitate (Vitamin A) nourishes the skin and assists in the “rejuvenation process that maintains a more youthful appearance.” Alpha Hydroxy Acids gently remove dead skin and provide an added antioxidant. In this formula I use the gentle and natural form of AHA’s that occur in natural fruit extracts.

name: Vita-C 10 Day Wild Berry Treatment
description:
Vita-C 10 Day Treatment
1 oz. = About 3 months supply
at least 70% organic/100% vegan

Intended for 
• Fine Lines
• Sun Damage
• Enlarged Pores
• Hyper-pigmentation
• Breakout (old, hardened papules...)

This light home "peel" has the unique ability to bring a high concentration of vitamin C esters to the skin while using the gentle aha action of Wild Blueberry, Cranberry and Red Raspberry. The vitamin C esters, vitamin E and herbal extracts create a synergetic blend that helps to fight off the assault your skin encounters on a daily basis and protect from an onslaught of from free radicals. 

The purpose of the Vita-C treatment is to carefully bring your skin to the “breaking point” of where it is just peeling (usually between 5 and 10 days, though you should go for every other day if you have very sensitive skin) and then stop and let your skin recover (usually 3 weeks to a month).  This recovery period is VERY IMPORTANT.  You do not want to use any suppressive therapies (such as anti-biotic ointments or steroid/cortisone creams) on your skin during this time.  You also want to make sure to EAT WELL, hydrate, and be respectful of the sun.  

Those blessed with sensitive skin may want to remove the Vita-C 10 Day Treatment after 5 minutes and moisturize.  Hardened and tough skin can leave it on and either apply moisturizer (or Nourish & Replenish Oil mixed with water) over it or simply go to bed and moisturize in the morning.  

The 1oz jar of Vita-C 10 Day treatment is enough for a series of 3 “months”.  Please be aware to use clean utensils to dip into the jar to preserve the integrity of the ingredients.  After 6 months, the product may loose potency.  This cycle of peel/recovery may be repeated up to 6 times in a year.  (Just listen to your skin and don’t over-do it, OK?)

name: Agnes Day & Night Crème {Cleanser}
description:
Agnes Day & Night Crème glides on with a silky smoothness and rinses completely, leaving your skin soft, smooth, clean and nourished. With advanced ingredients for the stresses a busy lifestyle, environmentally-challenged and mature skin. See dramatic differences within one month of using this in a simple daily regimen!

Uses:

Day: Mist your face with any Hydrosol and apply a small amount of Agnes Day & Night Crème, sweeping upwards in circular motions. Wet an organic cloth and gently remove the crème with luke-warm water.

Night: Apply a dime size scoop of Agnes Day & Night Crème to dry skin—yes, right over your make-up. Work around the face in gentle, circular motions for a few moments. Wet fingertips and massage more thoroughly, getting into the corners of the nose the sides of the ears, up along the scalp and down the neck. Wet an organic cloth and gently remove the crème with luke-warm water.

Anytime: A reviving Masque...Apply a thick layer over clean skin and relax for 10-20 minutes. Remove with a damp cloth.


ADVANCED SKINCARE NOTES:

In addition to the powerful cleansing provided by green papaya and pineapple enzymes (as well as the natural lipophilic and hydrophilic properties of a perfect blend of oil & water) the Agnes Day & Night Crème contains an impressive arsenal of anti-oxidants and active compounds. Pomegranate and Rooibos join together to mimic of the enzyme Super Oxide Dismutase (S.O.D.) and attack free radicals—limiting their damaging effects on the skin. Panthenol (B-complex) Retinol (A) Tocopherol (E) and Vitamin C Ester provide a high-energy blend of vitamins. And, of course, the addition of the much beloved MSM and DMAE (youth-promoting supplements) along with a synergistic blend of our favorite active herbal oils (Evening Primrose, Rosehip, Cranberry Seed & Carrot!) will boost your skin’s natural radiance, smooth & even skin tone, refine pores, and promote a lovely countenance for you to go on your way—night or day! Over 90% certified organic ingredients.

name: DMAE Firming Eye Gel
description:
It's a real eye opener. At least 92% Organic Ingredients.

Pat this botanical based gel under your eyes to feel refreshed and look awake all day! Made with Organic Aloe to sooth and calm puffiness, Witch Hazel to reduce dark circles, real Distilled Cucumber Juice (yes, the scent is REAL) to hydrate outer layers of your skin (reducing the look of fine lines) and highly anti-oxidant Cranberry Seed Oil. In addition to nature's bounty, this firming eye gel packs in Vitamin B5 and a healthy portion of DMAE*. It can even be used as a face or neck masque to help firm & tone problem areas!

When to Use:
In the morning (after your moisturizer and before make-up)

Application
1. Using your ring finger, pat 3 small dabs of DMAE Firming Eye Gel on the bone under each eye.

2. Gently smooth along the ridge from the inner eye to the outer corner.

There is no need to rub product directly under the eye- it will travel up the thin skin to the area where you want it to go. 

Remember: a little goes a long way

*About DMAE
DMAE is a naturally occurring substance that facilitates the synthesis of a neurotransmitter acetylcholine: the compound released from the ends of nerve fibers that is in involved in the transmission of nerve impulses. DMAE has also been shown to stimulate the synthesis of phosphatidylcholine, an essential fatty acid that improves and protects cell membranes which have been damaged by free-radicals (oxidation) while boosting circulation. Another intriguing finding in some DMAE studies was that it reduced the accumulation of lipofuscin deposits (cellular pigments made up of aggregated chucks of molecular waste inside cells). Furthermore, it has been demonstrated that DMAE causes some degree of skin and pore tightening & people report cumulative effect with continued use of the product. DMAE can't fully reverse existing facial sag, but it may reduce its further progression.

Holy Basil {Ocimum tenuiflorum} with Essential Minerals

name: Arnica Balm
description:
Give some good love to bruises, swelling & aching muscles!

Arnica is known for effectively reducing muscle pain as well as aches from trauma, over-exertion, and sprains. Apply topically to bruises to reduce inflammation and increase circulation, bringing relief to pain and swelling. Do not ingest. Not for broken skin.

Made with Coconut Oil infused with sustainably wild-crafted Red Clover (Trifolium pratense) and Calendula Flowers (Calendula officinalis), Organic Sesame Oil infused with Arnica (Asteraceae), Shea Butter, Turmeric, pure Beeswax and Rosemary essential oil (Rosmarinus officinalis).

Water will degrade product & heat will melt product.
FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY.

description:
Aches, arthritic conditions & nerve damage

Highly effective at soothing muscle pain and aches from trauma, arthritic conditions & nerve damage. Massage onto sore areas to increase the circulation and hasten healing. Do not use on open wounds or ingest. Be aware, this product stain clothes and make treated skin more sensitive to the sun.

description:

name: Lavender & Rose Petal Witch Hazel
description:
A distillation of Witch Hazel leaves and bark infused with Organic Lavender buds and Rose Petals to provide superb herbal comfort.

Witch Hazel (Hamamelis virginiana) has been used for many centuries as an astringent and general body toner. This amazing formula takes it one step further, tincturing Organic Lavender buds and Rose Petals to provide even more herbal goodness. Each batch is tinctured separately and macerated for at least 6 weeks in the shade.

Saturate cotton pads with witch hazel to soothe tired eyes. It has also traditionally been used to relieve hemorrhoids (Amazing!) and varicose veins.

name: Steamboat Herbal Steamer
description:
How to use:

Never steam dry, unprotected skin. Apply a layer of Nourish & Replenish Oil, Cow Fart Juice, or NO EVIL over your skin before leaning over steam.

Place 1oz (about a shotglass) of herbs in a large bowl and secure in a safe place. Pour about one quart of boiling water over the herbs and sit comfortably nearby. Lean over bowl (about 10 to 15 inches away) and use a towel to create a "tent around the steam". Inhale and enjoy!

CAUTION: Boiling water is VERY HOT and can BURN YOU! Do not get too close to the steam. Do not pour boiling water into a plastic bowl as it may melt and hurt you. Do not put boiling or very hot water directly on the skin!

While you enjoy your steam for ten to fifteen minutes, you can even give yourself a lovely facial massage.

Another fun idea is to let the steam bath cool and strain the plant pieces out of the water, pressing out as much of the "goodness" as you possibly can. You can then take this water and store it in a glass bottle (preferably with a spray top) in your refrigerator. This Herbal Infusion is now a lovely toner that will stay good for up to a week. (If it starts to smell funny before that, let it go. When in doubt, throw it out!)

The steamboat steamer rolls along through the seasons, grabbing the best of the available herbs while taking care to complement the changing needs of the body throughout the cycling year.

name: Ancient Secrets Body Scrub
description:
A gentle herbal scrub which combines turmeric, mustard seed, jojoba, and grapefruit seed. Wonderful for body blemishes, dry skin and rough spots, and ingrown hairs.

Use:
Gentle enough for daily use. Smooth skin results even if only used every few days in the shower or bath. Apply to moistened skin, scrub lightly in a circular motion with an organic cotton cloth or a natural sea sponge. Rinse completely when finished. Enjoy smoothed, refreshed skin!

Pre-wax: Use every other day for a week before your waxing appointment, but discontinue 2 days before to rest skin.
Post-wax: Wait at least 1 day (especially for the bikini line) 
and scrub in the shower. It will also remove any traces of excess wax or stickiness.

We have been behind many closed doors with healers and beauty therapists from around the world. Over and over again, we hear the healing mantra of the herbs in this Ancient Secrets Body Scrub.

Turmeric has long been used in Ayurvedic skin care. It has naturally occurring anti-inflammatory, antibacterial and anti-microbial properties and has been used both internally and topically in Ayurvedic and Chinese medicine. In India it is used on cuts, bruises and burns. Some Indian women use turmeric to keep them free of superfluous hair and to give a glow to the skin. Turmeric is a rhizomatous herbaceous perennial plant from the ginger family and it is native to tropical South Asia. The Government of Thailand is currently funding a project to isolate tetrahydrocurcuminoids from turmeric, a colorless compound found in turmeric which is believed to have high antioxidant, skin lightening properties and to treat skin inflammations.

Mustard has been used for many years by cultures around the world because of its reputation to increase circulation and open pores. It is thought to stimulate sweating which in turn helps the body rid itself of toxins. Neem is widely used in India as an antibacterial, antiviral, anti-fungal, antiseptic and anti-parasitic agent in skin care for centuries.

Jojoba oil contains a waxy substance that is similar to skin sebum. One of the most common problems with oily skin is that the tendency is to try to dry out the skin to compensate for the oiliness. However, instead the skin produces extra oil trying to protect itself. The wonderful thing about using jojoba oil is that it can mimic the skin’s sebum allowing oily skin to balance out and stop over producing oil. Jojoba oil has excellent moisturizing and protective effects.

Grapefruit essential oil is known to be an antiseptic, disinfectant, lymphatic stimulant and tonic essential oil. It has a lymphatic stimulant action and is also very effective in controlling liquid processes in the skin, making it effective in cases of water retention and in detoxification. At the same time it tones the skin and eases congestion in oily skins, which makes it helpful in treating acne. 

Need we say more?

name: Newfangled Ideas Coffee Body Scrub
description:
An invigorating sea salt scrub which combines coffee and herbal magic to address an issue we all face at one point: the dreaded cellulite.

Use:
Gentle enough for daily use. Can reduce the appearance of cellulite even if only used every few days in the shower or bath. Apply to moistened skin, scrub lightly in a circular motion with an organic cotton cloth or a natural sea sponge. Rinse completely when finished. Enjoy smoothed, refreshed skin!

Coffee has long been used to smooth out ripples. Take advantage of this traditional and natural source of smoothing!

name: Shave
description:
Between a Rock & a Hard Face : Shave, with Jojoba, Olive & Meadowfoam

Shaving Oil for gentle and manly men. Conditions & protects skin & while improving complexion.

Botanical, seed and fruit oils lubricate, soften and protect the skin, alleviating razor burn and irritations like nicks and ingrown hairs. Ideal for those with sensitive or dry skin. Even a small amount dramatically improves razor glide and provides for a sublime shave.
Directions: Pump a little onto a wet palm, rub hands together and massage into a light lather on the area to be shaved. Shave, rinse, and follow with Splash for optimum outcome.

Ingredients
Golden Jojoba Oil*, Pure Olive Squalane, mMeadowfoam Seed Oil*,Gotu Kola and Holy Basil infused Sesame Oil*, Grapeseed Oil, Neem Oil, Camphor Oil, <1/100 % amazing essential oils.
*organic

name: Splash
description:
Between a Rock & a Hard Face : Splash
Post-Shave Spray for gentle and manly men. Soothes and promotes healing. Smells like heaven. {2oz}

A must for healing redness, bumps or post-shave burning, Splash imparts a modest “bite” upon application before immediate soothing. Witch Hazel, a herbal staple, reduces redness and irritation. Absorbs quickly and evenly and can even be used for irritated patches on the body, post-waxing.

Directions: Spray directly on to recently shaved areas of the face, neck or body. Pat gently and allow to air dry.

Ingredients
Organic Witch Hazel Distillate, Distillate of Holy Basil (Ocimum tenuiflorum), 3% Alcohol, <1/100 % amazing essential oils.

name: Bug Off!
description:
With Neem, Juniper & Geranium: A Natural deterent against mosquitos, gnats, ticks & flies. SAFE FOR BABIES AND CHILDREN!
{2oz Aluminum Sprayer}

Directions: 
Spray on your exposed areas of skin as well as hats and clothes (no oil so it will not stain fabric). Reapply as needed. Safe for use on babies and young children. Avoid eye-contact and rinse with water 
should it occur. 
Oil-Free, Soy-free, Citronella-Free (You won’t smell like a candle!) & DEET-free. No synthetic or petroleum based ingredients. Hypoallergenic, Non-irritating, Vegan, & Biodegradable.  
Safe for use on dogs. {Shake before use.}

Ingredients:
Hydro-distillate of Organic Witch Hazel, double-distilled Organic Alcohol (7%), Organic Azadirachta indica (Neem) Oil, Essential Oils of Cedrus deodara (Cedarwood), Cupressus sempervirens (Cypress), Aniba roseodora (Rosewood) , Juniperus communis (Juniper Berry), Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender), Pelargonium graveolens (Geranium), Thymus vulgaris (white thyme)

name: Lymphatic Body Brushing
description:
Your lymph system regulates all of the “other” fluids in your body (other than blood). It is important to keep your lymph moving to prevent it from becoming stagnant. Today’s lifestyles prevent many of us from getting enough lymphatic movement on a daily basis. This treatment not only feels great (kind of like a light massage with a brush), but it is the perfect kick start and end to any detox program. You will learn how to body brush at home as part of your regular routine, and receive your own, beautiful lymphatic body brush. Session ends with a hot-towel full-body rub including hand mixed oils.  45 minutes. {$155}

Each treatment is tailored to your particular needs. Your special requests and concerns are always welcome.  Please notify us when you make your appointment.

After a short relaxation period you are escorted to a shower to remove the treatment products. 50-60 minutes. {$205}

name: Inner Strength Tea
description:
Build your inner strength with this nourishing organ conditioner. High in soluble minerals, enjoy either hot or cold! Wonderful for everyone, including children. Delicious!

Made with Organic Nettles, Organic Oatstraw, & Organic Red Raspberry Leaf

{Use} Steep 1 scoop in a teapot of boiling water for up to 8 hours. Strain and enjoy hot or cold.

Available in a 1oz sample, 8oz medium bag, or 16oz large bag.

name: Detox Essential Oil (5ml)
description:
We think of this as a spring cleaning blend. 5ml $22

◊Fill medium size spray bottles with an ounce plain Olive Castile Soap, 5 drops of the Detox Blend, and the rest with water and keep one in the kitchen and one by the toilet.
◊Add one drop to an entire bucket of hand-washables.
◊Fill a 2 oz spray bottle (a recycled toner bottle works well) with distilled water, 3 drops Detox blend and 2 drops lavender. This is perfect for refreshing linens, masking the scent of the kitty-box and as an ironing mist (though I would test it out first--in a non-conspicuous area-- for silks and delicates).
◊For someone who is trying to “break” a habit (smoking, snacking, face-picking), a whiff of the Detox blend can be a lovely reminder and distraction to bring you back to the present moment and analyze your actions.

All essential oils are intense distillations that procure the smallest, most concentrated “essence” of an herb. These essences are so precious that it can take up to 1 lb of plant material to make 1 drop of essential oil, and should be used with respect & discretion. By nature, they have excellent anti-bacterial and preservative qualities, though any concoction that includes aloe or water will still be unstable & have a short shelf life. Therefore, it is best to make small batches using steam-distilled water, store in a well-labeled airtight container (preferably in a dark, cool place) & used within a couple of months.

description:
This unique blend of essential oils is meant to clear the air & prevent airborne pathogens from penetrating your system while boosting your body’s natural immune response. Used daily during the cold season (on a hankie, or added to Massage in a Bottle at 2 drops per 1 oz. for a chest rub); this formula may help to keep you healthier and feeling up to any weather!

description:
Wonderful, healing, heady aroma.

Mix 1p distilled vinegar and 1 p distilled water in a medium to large size spray bottle. Add 3 drops geranium oil. Use this to wash the windows. Dry them with old newsprint. (also useful if the cat pees in the sofa cover 10 minutes before guests are expected.)

name: Rosemary Essential Oil (5 ml)
description:
So many uses, so little time.

Make a hot oil hair treatment: Fill a mug with hot water. Place a shot-glass inside filled with Massage in a Bottle and 3 drops of rosemary oil. Test to make sure that it is not too hot before you apply the mixture to your scalp and work it through to the ends. Wrap an old towel around your hair and relax for an hour (or even overnight!) before rinsing out and following with a hair toner of ½ apple cider vinegar and ½ chamomile tea (or plain water).

description:
This warm and sensuous blend has quite a cult following in our Brooklyn neighborhood. (Though the ladies love it, its main worshippers seem to be men). Relaxing to the nervous system, Vitality opens blocked passages and then allows deeper concentration. It can be used in shoulder massage to maintain energy while working on all night projects, in a essential oil burner during an all-day session in the recording studio, and mixed with Bumble Balm ready to be rubbed behind your ear before an important meeting. Oh yeah…when the work is done, it allows you to relax and concentrate on…other important things.

description:
This is our finest blend of pure, essential oils. Exhilarating essences are incredibly useful for toning & regulating a woman’s cycle. It may also help ease PMS and the uncomfortable times that many women experience during menopause. Due to the high-potency of essential oils, pregnant & breast-feeding women should use caution with the use of any essential oils.
